page.title: 15The Folk Festival
page.content: The Folk Festival has been going for 21 years.It was the council that started it,because they thought it was a good idea.The same man has orgainized it all the time.Cherry Hinton Hall is a very big place,so they decided to have it there.Many people attend each year.He chooses the groups by listening to their records and talking to them.He pays 25 groups,and more just come along of their own accord.Lots of campers come over night to get a good place.He has only ever had 6 complaints about the noise and most people don't mind.They clear up the rubbish before and after the festival.It takes about 2 days.There has been no vandalism in 21 years.Most people park outside the grounds.The total annual profit is about Â£8000.
